intro.title: A NEW PORTFOLIO
text: It is a period of career transition. A brave developer, striking from a hidden base, has won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire of boring resumes.
During the battle, Rebel spies managed to steal secret plans to the Empire’s ultimate weapon, the 3D developer portfolio, an unrejectable portfolio for any recruiter out there.
Pursued by the Empire’s sinister agents, Developer Akash races home aboard his starship, custodian of the stolen plans that can save his people and restore creativity to the galaxy....
